Package icyllis.modernui.text.method

Class ScrollingMovementMethod

java.lang.Object
icyllis.modernui.text.method.BaseMovementMethod
icyllis.modernui.text.method.ScrollingMovementMethod
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovementMethod
Direct Known Subclasses:
LinkMovementMethod
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault public class ScrollingMovementMethod extends BaseMovementMethod
A movement method that interprets movement keys by scrolling the text buffer.
